comments.comments_text: Sinaly Diomande (Lyon) attempts to head the ball away from inside his own six-yard box, but unluckily he turns a cross from the corner into his own net. It ended up inside the top left corner.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Houssem Aouar shows great vision to find Lucas Paqueta (Lyon) with a cheeky pass inside the box, and his first-time shot is precise and sails into the bottom left corner. 3:1.
